name: King of Fighters R-1
description:
The Incredibly Popular Fighting Game "KOF" Appears on NEOGEO POCKET! You can call it: "KING OF FIGHTERS R-1"!
Including Kyo Kusanagi and Iori Yagami, 14 of SNK's Most Popular Characters Let the Sparks Fly!
Choose two operating modes: "EXTRA" and "ADVANCED."
Use the NEOGEO POCKET LINK CABLE (sold separately) for communication battles!
